scripts.gen-mainnet-test-poh: mustache config/main-test-poh.json subgraph.pohv1.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/main-test-poh.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-sepolia-test: mustache config/sepolia.old.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/sepolia.old.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-sepolia: mustache config/sepolia.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/sepolia.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-gnosis: mustache config/gnosis.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/gnosis.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-mainnet-before-audit: mustache config/mainnet-before-audit.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet-before-audit.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-gnosis-before-audit: mustache config/gnosis-before-audit.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/gnosis-before-audit.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-mainnet-old: mustache config/mainnet.old.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.old.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-gnosis-old: mustache config/gnosis.old.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/gnosis.old.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-chiado-goldsky-old: mustache config/chiado-goldsky.old.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/chiado-goldsky.old.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-chiado-goldsky: mustache config/chiado-goldsky.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/chiado-goldsky.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.gen-chiado: mustache config/chiado.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/chiado.json utils/hardcoded.template.ts > utils/hardcoded.ts && yarn gen
scripts.deploy-mainnet-test-poh: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-mainnet-test-poh && yarn build && graph deploy --studio poh
scripts.deploy-sepolia-test: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-sepolia-test && yarn build && graph deploy --studio proof-of-humanity-sepolia-test
scripts.deploy-sepolia: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-sepolia && yarn build && graph deploy --studio proof-of-humanity-sepolia
scripts.deploy-mainnet: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-mainnet && yarn build && graph deploy --studio poh-origin-mainnet
scripts.deploy-gnosis: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-gnosis && yarn build && graph deploy --studio poh-origin-gnosis
scripts.deploy-mainnet-before-audit: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-mainnet-before-audit && yarn build && graph deploy --studio pohv2-prod-mainnet
scripts.deploy-gnosis-before-audit: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-gnosis-before-audit && yarn build && graph deploy --studio pohv2-prod-gnosis
scripts.deploy-mainnet-old: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-mainnet-old && yarn build && graph deploy --studio proof-of-humanity-mainnet
scripts.deploy-gnosis-old: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-gnosis-old && yarn build && graph deploy --studio proof-of-humanity-gnosis
scripts.deploy-chiado-goldsky-overwrite: yarn gen-chiado-goldsky && yarn build && yarn goldsky-login && goldsky subgraph delete proof-of-humanity-chiado/1.0.1 && goldsky subgraph deploy proof-of-humanity-chiado/1.0.1 --path ./build
scripts.deploy-chiado-goldsky: yarn gen-chiado-goldsky && yarn build && yarn goldsky-login && goldsky subgraph deploy proof-of-humanity-chiado/1.0.1 --path ./build
scripts.deploy-chiado-goldsky-old-overwrite: yarn gen-chiado-goldsky-old && yarn build && yarn goldsky-login && goldsky subgraph delete proof-of-humanity-chiado/1.0.2 && goldsky subgraph deploy proof-of-humanity-chiado/1.0.2 --path ./build
scripts.deploy-chiado-goldsky-old: yarn gen-chiado-goldsky-old && yarn build && yarn goldsky-login && goldsky subgraph deploy proof-of-humanity-chiado/1.0.2 --path ./build
scripts.deploy-chiado: yarn thegraph-login && yarn gen-chiado && yarn build && graph deploy --studio proof-of-humanity-chiado
